secure.title: Secure & Reliable

seo.title: Features - AutoListing.io
seo.description: Discover all the powerful features of AutoListing.io: property management, CRM, email automation, AI assistant, and more.

hero.title: Everything you need to grow
hero.subtitle: Powerful features designed specifically for real estate professionals. No feature gating - everything is included at every tier.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Automation
socialMedia.description: Automate your property marketing across all platforms

posting.title: Automated Posting
posting.description: Schedule and auto-publish property listings to Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and more.

content.title: AI Content Generation
content.description: Generate engaging captions, hashtags, and property descriptions with AI.

media.title: Image & Video Posts
media.description: Create stunning visual posts with your property photos and virtual tours.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Track engagement, reach, and leads generated from each social post.

types.title: Multi-Property Type Support
types.description: Manage sales, long-term rentals, and holiday lets all in one place.

extraction.title: AI-Powered Extraction
extraction.description: Upload photos or documents and let AI extract property details automatically.

photos.title: Photo Management
photos.description: Organise, reorder, and manage property photos with drag-and-drop ease.

workflow.title: Status Workflow
workflow.description: Track properties through New, For Sale, Sale/Let Agreed, Sold, and Archived.

profiles.title: Buyer & Seller Profiles
profiles.description: Store preferences, search criteria, and communication history for every contact.

matching.title: Smart Matching
matching.description: Automatically match buyers with suitable properties based on their criteria.

timeline.title: Activity Timeline
timeline.description: Track all interactions, viewings, and communications in one place.

leads.title: Lead Capture
leads.description: Capture leads from your website, chatbot, and email campaigns.

campaigns.title: Multi-Step Campaigns
campaigns.description: Create automated email sequences with customisable delays between messages.

templates.title: Template Library
templates.description: Build and reuse professional email templates for consistent branding.

tracking.title: Engagement Tracking
tracking.description: Monitor open rates, click rates, and engagement metrics in real-time.

cancellation.title: Smart Cancellation
cancellation.description: Automatically stop sequences when leads reply or take action.

chatbot.title: Embeddable Chatbot
chatbot.description: Add an AI assistant to your website that knows your listings and captures leads.

knowledge.title: Custom Knowledge Base
knowledge.description: Train the AI on your business, policies, and frequently asked questions.

leads.title: Lead Generation
leads.description: Qualify visitors and capture contact details through natural conversation.

context.title: Context-Aware Responses
context.description: AI understands your properties and CRM data to provide accurate answers.

webhooks.title: Real-Time Webhooks
webhooks.description: Get instant notifications when listings are created, updated, or sold.

security.title: Secure Payloads
security.description: HMAC-signed webhook payloads ensure data integrity and authenticity.

retries.title: Automatic Retries
retries.description: Failed webhook deliveries are automatically retried with exponential backoff.

logs.title: Delivery Logs
logs.description: Full visibility into webhook delivery status and payload history.

domains.title: Custom Domains
domains.description: Use your own domain for a fully branded experience.

logo.title: Logo & Branding
logo.description: Upload your logo and customise colours to match your brand.

site.title: Public Listings Site
site.description: A beautiful, SEO-optimised website for your property listings.

sharing.title: Social Sharing
sharing.description: Optimised previews when properties are shared on social media.

cta.title: Ready to see it in action?
cta.subtitle: Start your free trial today and experience all these features with 100 credits included.

seo.title: Support - AutoListing.io
seo.description: Get help with AutoListing.io. Contact our support team, access documentation, or submit a data protection request.

hero.title: How Can We Help?
hero.subtitle: Our team is here to support you. Choose an option below or contact us directly.

email.title: Email Support
email.description: Get help from our support team
email.intro: For general enquiries and technical support, email us at:
email.response: We aim to respond within 24 hours during business hours.

chat.title: In-App Chat
chat.intro: Logged-in users can access our AI-powered assistant for instant help with:

gdpr.title: Data Protection Requests (GDPR)
gdpr.description: Exercise your rights under GDPR and Irish data protection law
gdpr.intro: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, delete, or export your personal data. You can also object to processing or request restrictions on how we use your data.

howTo.title: To submit a data protection request:
howTo.step1: Email our Data Protection Officer at
howTo.step2: Include your full name and the email address associated with your account
howTo.step3: Specify which right you wish to exercise (access, rectification, erasure, etc.)
howTo.step4: Provide any details that help us locate your data

gdpr.response: We will respond to your request within 30 days as required by GDPR. In complex cases, we may extend this by up to 60 days with notice.

rights.title: Your GDPR Rights:
rights.access: Right of Access: Request a copy of your personal data
rights.rectification: Right to Rectification: Correct inaccurate data
rights.erasure: Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your data
rights.restriction: Right to Restriction: Limit how we use your data
rights.portability: Right to Portability: Receive your data in a portable format
rights.object: Right to Object: Object to certain types of processing

gdpr.complaint: If you are not satisfied with our response, you may lodge a complaint with the

login.title: Account Access
login.intro: Access your AutoListing dashboard to manage listings, contacts, and settings.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.intro: Comprehensive guides to help you get the most out of AutoListing.
